abstract: NCAA football oversight committee will set guidelines choosing bowl game participants when there are not enough bowl-eligible teams; other college football news noted.
lead_paragraph: The N.C.A.A. football oversight committee will provide guidelines for matching bowls with sub.-500 teams if there are not enough bowl-eligible squads.

headline.print_headline: Sports Briefing | College Football; Bowl Guidelines to Be Set

snippet: The N.C.A.A. football oversight committee will provide guidelines for matching bowls with sub.-500 teams if there are not enough bowl-eligible squads.
